item.title: Senate pushes for Homeland Security funding deal as shutdown looms
item.description: Most of the federal government is expected to shut down beginning Saturday as Republicans and Democrats scramble to strike a deal on DHS funding.

item.title: Friction emerges between Trump, Venezuelan opposition over Machado’s return
item.description: The administration may prefer reliability over democracy in Caracas, worrying advocates for opposition leader María Corina Machado.

item.title: Handling of Pretti investigation has some prosecutors on verge of quitting
